name: Sea of Beats
description:
Ahoy, matey! Yo-ho-ho! Listen, I hear there’s some booty on a far away island, and I want it… maybe I’ll even share some of it if you can help me steer our boat. Or not!

A 2D pirate themed rhythm game! Travel across the sea through storms and past a monster to reach treasure. What is the highest score you can get?

CONTROLS

Use the keys Z,X,N,M to hit the falling arrows.

Z: blue box

X: red box

N: yellow box

M: green box
